name: Wizard Dance Off
description:
MOST RECENT VERSION: https://damieba.itch.io/wizard-dance-off

Title says it all! Fight using the power of dance.

BROWSER VERSION MIGHT NOT LOAD (good thing there is a downloadable version for windows)

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys/WASD: Choose spell, make moves.

Space: begin dancing (after spell chosen)

This isn't a traditional rhythm game where you see notes coming at you. You'll need to pay attention to the environment and feel the beat to hit notes and build combos.

Game is super simple in its current state, but there is so much more we could add down the line.

Developed by: Colin :DAmieba" Harris (https://damieba.itch.io/)

and Michael Probst (https://meaty-okra-games.itch.io/)
